record.value: Logger name (Default: dot-delimeted representation of the service which invoked this log service)
ID of message in the message catalog. (Note: If using IDs, you may not use the "text" input).
The log message text to emit. Message text may include mdc variables in the form ${variable} (Note: If using message text you may not use message ID)

Level indicating the severity of this log event. If the logger for this log event is configured for a threshold lower than this level, the log message will be ignored and not logged. Possible values for level are: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE. (Default: INFO)

Add MDC variables that are available only for the duration of this log event, and that are discarded afterwards. (Note: To persist MDC variables that remain after the log event, use the wx.logger.pub:mdc service).
